desc.p: This field has the amount that is scheduled for the Principal Increase. Fields CONTRACT.NO and PRIN.AMOUNT form a related multi value set.
This field has MG contract IDs, which has a principal increase Scheduled on the record ID date. Fields CONTRACT.NO and PRIN.AMOUNT form a related multi value set.
This field has the amount that is scheduled for the Principal Increase. Fields CONTRACT.NO and PRIN.AMOUNT form a related multi value set.
This file gets updated when there is a principal increase in MG contract.It holds the contract number and Principal increase amount. The Principal increase effective date is the id of this file
This field has MG contract IDs, which has a principal increase Scheduled on the record ID date. Fields CONTRACT.NO and PRIN.AMOUNT form a related multi value set.
This file gets updated when there is a principal increase in MG contract.It holds the contract number and Principal increase amount. The Principal increase effective date is the id of this file
